hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Salamah said:“I heard ‘Aishah say: ‘I used to owe fasts from the month of Ramadan, and I would not make them up for until Sha’ban came.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَضَاءِ رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning making up for (fasts missed) during Ramadan
